title: feat: Complete deep conversational testing feature
head: feature/deep-conversational-testing
body:
## Summary
Complete deep conversational testing functionality for the allele project.

## Code Review Focus
**For Gemini Code Assist:** Please provide detailed technical feedback on:

### Code Quality & Architecture
- Review the actual code implementation in the modified files
- Assess code quality, readability, and maintainability
- Check for proper error handling and edge cases
- Evaluate architectural decisions and design patterns

### Functionality & Testing
- Verify that the deep conversational testing features work as intended
- Review test coverage and test quality
- Check for potential bugs or logical issues
- Assess integration with existing codebase

### Performance & Best Practices
- Look for performance optimizations or bottlenecks
- Check adherence to project coding standards
- Review resource usage and memory management
- Assess security considerations

## Changes
- Added PR creation plan documentation
- Integrated mcp-servers for enhanced testing capabilities  
- Updated OpenSpec specifications for feature completion
- Ready for detailed code review

## Reviewers
- @jimmyjdejesus-cmyk
- Gemini Code Assist
